channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] watsonx.governance (aiopenscale) was made available in the London catalog
[added] Dynamiq AI Legal Agent (dynamiq-ai-agent-legal)
item.description: A comprehensive legal research agent supporting legal professionals, law students, and individuals requiring legal information

item.title: [added] Dynamiq AI Medical Researcher Agent (dynamiq-ai-agent-001)
item.description: This is Medical Researcher AI Agent that supports clinicians, patients, and caregivers.

item.title: [updated] Match 360 (mdm-oc) has changed the description of the plan named essential-edition
item.description:
*before*: This plan provides you with all the core capabilities of IBM Match 360, a multi-domain operational and analytical master data management (MDM) service that delivers at scale an integrated and consolidated view of critical enterprise data across data silos, leveraging intelligent and tunable data matching and entity resolution as well as management of other related entities across the enterprise. In addition, advanced capabilities around governance, including support for AI assisted profiling and mapping of data source to data model, data quality assessment of inputs and resultant resolved entities, as well as ability to enforce enterprise data quality and data privacy policies for master data is included. *** Requires subscription of IBM Knowledge Catalog as a pre-requisite, *after*: This plan provides you with the core capabilities of IBM Match 360, a multi-domain operational and analytical master data management (MDM) service that delivers at scale an integrated and consolidated view of critical enterprise data across data silos, leveraging intelligent and tunable data matching and entity resolution as well as management of other related entities across the enterprise.
*** Advanced governance and quality capabilities, including support for Al assisted profiling and mapping, data quality assessment of inputs and resolved entities, as well as enforcing enterprise data quality and privacy policies for master data is provided by an additional subscription of IBM watsonx.data intelligence Standard plan.

item.title: [updated] watsonx.data integration (watsonx-data-integration) has changed the description of the plan named trial
item.description: *before*: Trial plan services, including all data and assets, are deleted after 30 days. Trial limitations are described in Documentation under the section "Feature differences between watsonx.data integration plans"., *after*: Trial access ends after 30 days, at which point you cannot run jobs. However, all data and assets are securely retained and can be re-accessed after upgrading to a paid plan. Trial limitations are described in Documentation under the section "Feature differences between watsonx.data integration plans".
